summary: CONSUMER WANTED TO BE REIMBURSED FOR A REPAIR HE PAID FOR THAT SHOULD HAVE BEEN COVERED UNDER THE RECALL. THE ABS LIGHT  ILLUMINATED SO THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO HIS MECHANIC, THE MECHANIC REPLACED THE DUAL PRESSURE SWITCH FOR $340.00 BUT IT DID NOT COMPLETELY FIX THE PROBLEM.  THE MECHANIC DID SOME RESEARCH AND DISCOVERED THE RECALL.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE PUMP MOTOR ASSEMBLY FREE OF CHARGE, HOWEVER THE CONSUMER IS REQUESTING REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE 340 THAT HIS MECHANIC CHARGED TO FIX THE DUEL PRESSURE SWITCH WHICH WAS APART OF THE LIFE TIME WARRANTY RECALL. CHRYSLER HOTLINE INFORMED THE CONSUMER IT WAS NOT APART OF THE RECALL.  ( RECALL #96V099000).  *JB
